analysis: This update involves creating a new lease agreement for a property located at 10 Miles Ave, Woodbridge, Connecticut, with multiple lessees and detailed terms regarding rent, utilities, repairs, security deposit, and other conditions.
instructions: Create a new property at 10 Miles Ave, Woodbridge, Connecticut
Create a new lease for lessees Rebecca Rodriguez, John Cain, and Jacqueline Cain
Set the lease term to start on 2024-07-01 and end on 2025-06-30
Set the monthly rent to 2425
Set the total rent with pet fee to 2475
Set the rent due date to the 1st day of each calendar month, beginning on 2024-06-24
Allow payment methods: personal check, cashier's check, money order, or wire transfer
Assign utilities responsibility: lessees to pay for electric, internet, and cable services; lessor to pay for water and sewer costs
Require lessees to pay for professional cleaning services before vacating the premises
Set lessee responsibility for minor repairs up to 100
Set lessor reimbursement for repairs over 250 unless caused by lessee's negligence
Set the security deposit amount to 2600
Define conditions for security deposit refund: no outstanding utility bills or rent payments, no unreasonable damage or alterations, return of all keys and fobs, removal of all personal items
Set late fee to 50 for any rent payment not paid by the due date with a grace period of 10 days
Allow pets with a pet fee of 50 per month
Ensure lessees have peaceful enjoyment of the leased premises
Grant lessor the right to inspect the premises with 24-hour notice
Assign lessee responsibility for maintaining the premises in good order and repair
Require lessees to report any water leaks or malfunctions immediately
Require lessees to provide 30 days written notice for early termination
Set lessee responsibility for rent payment for the remainder of the lease term upon early termination
Set lessor telephone number to 2032335859
Set lessor email to Vadim.Tantsyura@outlook.com
